attributes.action: Why do Government think they are above the law ?
attributes.additional_details:
We are hearing that serving Government officials may have been reported on by the Police.
Why are the outraged ?
Are they above the Law ?
Do they have Immunity from prosecution?
In my opinion if you have done nothing wrong you have nothing to fear.
Why is it one law for one and one for another
If you are with me please join this petition to show the MPs of this land that we elect them and we can, via proper rule dispose of them as well
